data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Eastern, Hong Kong.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Eastern, Hong Kong and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Eastern to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Eastern.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Eastern, Hong Kong.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 35,969 believers in Eastern, Hong Kong to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Eastern, Hong Kong so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern, Hong Kong has a population of 587,700.

We estimate Eastern has 35,969 people who might know Jesus, 40,934 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 510,797 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
